DLF AIG MWG Metadata Assessment Toolkit

Environmental Scan

test fork This was the first area of work for the DLF Metadata Assessment group in 2016. We performed a review of literature, tools, presentations, and organizations on the topics of metadata assessment and metadata quality with a focus on—but not limited to—digital repositories descriptive metadata.

Download a version of this resource as a PDF (static snapshot from fall 2016)

Early draft and notes for the Environmental Scan (not actively maintained)
